name: Jamilson Dantas
content: Jamilson DantasSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationAssistant ProfessorComputer Science DepartmentUniversidade Federal de Pernambucojrd@cin.ufpe.br  Jamilson DantasJamilson Dantas received his B.S. degree in Information Systems from the Paulo Afonso university centre, Brazil, in 2009. They received his M.Sc. degree and PhD in Computer Science from Universidade Federal de Pernambuco -- UFPE, Brazil in 2013-2018, where he is currently an Assistant Professor. His research interests include performance and dependability evaluation, Markov chains, Petri nets, and other formal models for analysis and simulation of computer and communication systems. He is working on research projects encompassing video streaming services, cloud computing systems, and network traffic modeling. Report abusePage detailsPage updated Report abuse
